scripts.build: cp packages/zendesk/zcli.apps.config-prod.json packages/zendesk/zcli.apps.config.json && node scripts/build.mjs prod ticket_sidebar
scripts.build:sta: cp packages/zendesk/zcli.apps.config-sta.json packages/zendesk/zcli.apps.config.json && node scripts/build.mjs sta ticket_sidebar
scripts.zcli:start: node scripts/build.mjs local ticket_sidebar && zcli apps:server dist
